Package external

Interface MapSystem

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
OfflineMapSystem
public interface MapSystem
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
Interface for the MapSystem. It allows requesting for directions between two address given as coordinates. There is only one MapSystem and all users of this application use the same system.

      Check if a point is within the bounds of the map
      Parameters:
      point - point to check
      Returns:

    • routeBetweenPoints

      com.graphhopper.ResponsePath routeBetweenPoints​(TransportMode mode, com.graphhopper.util.shapes.GHPoint startPoint, com.graphhopper.util.shapes.GHPoint destination)
      Generate the route between two points on the map
      Parameters:
      mode - transportation mode to generate route for
      startPoint - the starting point
      destination - the ending point
      Returns:
      The route to get from startPoint to endPoint.
